forage.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to go around searching for food or other supplies
forage.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: In the summer, the goats forage freely  (=in any place they want to go).
People are being forced to forage for food and fuel.
forage.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to search for something with your hands in a bag, drawer etc
forage.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: She foraged around in her purse and produced her ticket.
forage.translation[1].definitions[0].def: food supplies for horses and cattle
forage.translation[1].definitions[1].def: an act of searching for something
